channel.title: My stupid brother
channel.description: my stupid brother went on moparscape here and wanted to register and he thought it would be funny to put a spam email and register and now "guest" is baned from the websight and i cant log on using my regular computer and i just finished coding my server and was going to advertise this on my other acc (this acc is fucked up withe the advertising idk why it has my old server still from like 5 months ago) and its stuck on this acc on firefox (brother used internet to register with fake email) so now firefox thing won let me log out and its really stupid can you please just unban my ip?

item.title: My stupid brother
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

Si Force:

What’s the accounts name? Also i’m not sure if family members are an exception to the multiple accounts rule, i’ll have to look into it. If they aren’t an exception, i’m afraid you and your brother will have to share an account.

lol, are you guys really law makers lol

Read full topic

item.title: My stupid brother
item.dc:creator: @synchronized2 synchronized_
item.description:
@synchronized2 wrote:

[quote=“rant, post:22, topic:398178”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=495312.msg3621225#msg3621225 date=1307423801]

Your stupid for letting him.

[/quote]
this quote is all this topic needs[/quote][quote=“patargangstar, post:23, topic:398178”][quote author=Rash link=topic=495312.msg3621222#msg3621222 date=1307423674]
Your stupid for letting him.
[/quote][/quote]

You’re all stupid.

how the fuck can you stop something if you’re not there? If your mum went on your computer when you wasn’t there could you stop her? yea you could tell her not to go on it, but only if it’s a private computer - not a family one.

but we’re not talking about mums, who actually listen (most of the time -.-), we’re talking about his brother. if he’s young then he doesn’t really know about consequences and shit. the more you tell them not to do something the more they want to do it.

also, if it’s a family computer he can’t tell people not to go on it. think before you post.

tl;dr - how the fuck can you stop something when you’re not there?

Read full topic

I don’t know how you even managed to type that all out without using a single comma or full stop, skillz right der.

Clearing cookies and browser cache and data could’ve helped this, appears you got it fixed though.
[/quote]
stop being a grammar freak. k?[/quote]
Hardly being a grammar freak, it’s just basic english.

item.title: My stupid brother
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

pokemonn:

its not an acc he was trying to make an acc under a spam email and it baned us its fine now it got fixed

What would registering a different account using a “spam email” have to do with anything? So your saying if he used a regular email you would be fine?

um i wasn’t home? i came home to log on using internet and it said guest baned and asked him and he told me he used a fake email to register and it baned.
[/quote]

It’s called giving your computer a password and locking it.[/quote]Family computer?
